text: Lullabies & Wildflowers is the second solo recording from singer & actress, Melissa Errico and is a thematic collection of songs about mothers and their children. The album was released on Velour/Universal Records on 29 April 2008, (then Ghostlight Records). It was produced by Rob Mathes. The CD cover and accompanying booklet was created and illustrated by Kate Neckel. ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- ! No. !! Title !! Writer(s) !!
